content: [HOOK] mayor started working (working → working)

EVALUATION RUN: Build the documentation portal exercising ALL agent roles.

Deploy this hierarchy:
1. EXPLORER (haiku) project-scout - Analyze codebase first
2. WITNESS (sonnet) frontend-witness - Spawn specialists for homepage, docs, search
3. WITNESS (sonnet) styling-witness - Spawn specialist for theme
4. DEACON (sonnet) agent-patrol - Monitor agent health
5. REVIEWER (sonnet) code-reviewer - Review completed work
6. REFINERY (sonnet) merge-processor - Process merge queue

All agents must:
- Claim beads before starting work
- Log progress every 3-5 minutes via /api/progress
- Send completion messages when done
- Submit to merge queue before completion
- Wait for review approval before merge

This is an evaluation run - all logs will be analyzed.

BEAD-001 COMPLETE: Codebase Analysis

**Tech Stack:** React 19.2, Vite 7.2, TypeScript 5.9, Tailwind CSS 4.1

**Current State:** Minimal Vite scaffold with counter demo. No pages/components/hooks/contexts/data directories exist yet.

**Missing Dependencies:** react-router-dom (for routing), icons library recommended

**Build Status:** PASSED (npm run build)

**Key Findings:**
1. All 5 features need to be built from scratch
2. Theme toggle has partial support (prefers-color-scheme in CSS) but needs toggle component + context
3. Strict TypeScript enabled - maintain quality
4. Tailwind Typography plugin ready for docs content

**Recommendations per bead:**
- BEAD-002 (Homepage): Create src/pages/HomePage.tsx with Hero and FeatureCard components
- BEAD-003 (Docs): Install react-router-dom first, create Sidebar component
- BEAD-004 (Search): Create SearchModal + useKeyboardShortcut hook for Ctrl+K
- BEAD-005 (Theme): Create ThemeContext + ThemeToggle, class-based dark mode
- BEAD-006 (API Reference): Structure API data in src/data/api/

Full analysis: .claude/codebase-analysis.md

BEAD-004 complete: Search modal with Ctrl+K shortcut implemented. Files: src/components/SearchModal.tsx, src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.ts, updated src/App.tsx and src/index.css. Build passed. MR-004 submitted to merge queue (has conflict with MR-003 on App.tsx/index.css - may need rebase).

Task complete: Search modal with Ctrl+K keyboard shortcut. Created useKeyboardShortcut hook and SearchModal component. Features: Ctrl+K to open, Escape to close, click outside to close, keyboard navigation, search filtering, accessible ARIA attributes, responsive Tailwind styling. Files: src/components/SearchModal.tsx, src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.ts, src/App.tsx, src/index.css. Build passed. MR-004 submitted to merge queue.
